summary: "The View" is an ABC talk show started by Barbara Walters in 1997. It features a group of women discussing current events and interviewing famous people. The show has had many hosts over its 28 seasons, with six women currently leading the panel. It has won several Daytime Emmy Awards and is known for its lively discussions. Despite some controversies, "The View" remains one of the most popular daytime TV shows, especially for news and talk.
title: The View (talk show)
